name: Home Sweet Dungeon
description:
** Developed for VimJam 2 **

You're living a happy and silent life as the LIZARD KING in your DUNGEON. But, one day, knights start to break out into your HOME. Now, you must battle to defend your house and recover your tranquility.

Controls Move
InteractAttack Change power-up (when reached phase 2) Team

Programming, art, sfx - @lutd_c (aka ME)

Game design and testing - PaoloHitoshi

Music and sfx -
